info.name: ch4_challenge
info.description:
challenge chapter 5 - api documentation - Banking System

Feature:  
StartFragment

Users & Profile

- \[x\] POST api/v1/users (register)
    
- \[x\] POST api/v1/users/login (login)
    
- \[x\] GET api/v1/users (get all users)
    
- \[x\] GET api/v1/users/:userID (get by id)
    
- \[x\] pagination
    

Bank_Accounts / Account

- \[x\] POST api/v1/accounts (register)
    
- \[x\] GET api/v1/accounts (get all accounts)
    
- \[x\] GET api/v1/accounts/:accountID (get by id)
    
- \[x\] DELETE api/v1/accounts/:userID (delete account) - via req.body
    
- \[x\] PUT api/v1/transactions/deposit/:transactionID (deposit)
    
- \[x\] PUT api/v1/transactions/withdrawal/:transactionID (withdrawal)
    

Transactions

- \[x\] POST api/v1/transactions (transfer) - via req.body
    
- \[x\] GET api/v1/transactions (get all transactions)
    
- \[x\] GET api/v1/transactions/:transactionID (get by id) - show sender & receiver details  
    Created by Viery Nugroho
